attributes.comment:
Please reconsider raising the fees. Adoption of any sort is already very expensive
without raising these fees. In addition most of the forms such as fingerprints, I17h
are only good for 12 to 18 months before they expire, which with Chinese
adoption, they will, then the adoptive family must come up with this money again.
Most adoptive families are not wealthy, we can not afford to pay these fees again
expspecially if the fee prices are raised. Please allow families to continue
adopting children who need homes, DO NOT RAISE YOUR FEES!!!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Cheryl Lindner-Taylor
